text: 30:2-3 Dɨboboniba 9:9-11Me iakɨnir faragha zuimɨn isar kam damuasa ifonge, mati me bar fomɨra ami mokɨn. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir avɨriba Godɨn damazimɨn zueghamin arazibagh amizir puvatɨ, egha uaghan gumazamiziba iza Jerusalemɨn uari akuvazir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, atrivim uan gumazir dapaniba ko, an gumazamiziba, me iakɨnir namba 2ɨn isam damuasa akam akɨri.
